name: Nonsense Asteroid
description:
Nonsense Asteroid

▪ Game Description

Nonsense Asteroid is a causal and engaging game with simple and challenging gameplay!

Your ship has been damaged during a space travel, now you must survive for as long as possible while controlling a defective spaceship floating through space.

With simple one-button control mechanics, you must steer the ship through space avoiding all obstacles that appear on the screen. Your ship constantly rotates on its own axis, moving in the direction you are pointing the moment you push or hold the control button.

Both the difficulty of the game and the level of your characters are dictated from the intonation of the song, pay attention: everything is speeding up!

So do you have what it takes to survive in space?

Download and find out now!!
PS: This is a game made at GameJam+

▪ Diversifiers:

  • Minimalistic control: Your game can only involve 1 command button.
  • Mec Radio: The soundtrack should only be made of classic public domain compositions
  • Run: The game must use some kind of time limit as a determining factor
